name: Custom Thank You Page
author: ThemeinProgress

sections.description:
Custom Thank You Page plugin allows you to customize the final thank you page of a WooCommerce order.

Thanks to our plugin, you will be able to display a custom thank you page when your user purchase a specific product or from your whole WooCommerce catalog and can helps you to increase your sales.

For example you could include a coupon when a customer purchase a specific product.

Custom Thank You Page plugin is also compatible with the most popular plugins to insert tracking codes and snippets on the final thank you page of WooCommerce and you won’t lost your scripts when an user complete an order.

Plugin overview

Premium features.

Dynamics user data
The dynamic user data allow you to display a specific parameters of a WooCommerce order inside your thank you page, like the order ID.

Dynamics user data generator
You can load a specific dynamics user data inside the final thank you page.

Shortcodes support
You can include each available shortcode for WordPress shortcode.

Product selection
Set up the final thank you page for all products inside one or more product categories.

Device selection
Select one or more devices where you can load the custom content on thank you page.

Gateway ID
If needed, you can display a thank you page when an user complete the order using a specific payment gateway, like PayPal or a bank transfer.

Amount of order
If needed, you can display a thank you page when the amount of an order is higher than a specific value.

Backup section
You can import or export all your custom thank you pages by a single click.

1 click upgrades
Start automatically the plugin upgrades with simple one-click.

You can get the premium version, from the following link:
https://custom-thank-you-page-pro.demo.themeinprogress.com

Installation

Once you have installed the plugin, you just need to activate the plugin in order to enable it.

Configuration

Custom Thank You Page will add a new admin page, where you can manage all custom thank you pages.

Translators

Available Languages

  • English (Default)
  • Italiano
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/custom-thank-you-page’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Go to â€˜Custom Thank You Page’ page to configure the plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

Release date – February, 02 – 2024

  • Fixed: Editor height on plugin panel
  • Fixed: Documentation link
  • Tested with WordPress 6.4
  • Tested with WooCommerce 8.5

1.0.9

Release date – September, 16 – 2023

  • Fixed: Fatal error: Uncaught TypeError: Unsupported operand types on PHP 8.

1.0.8

Release date – September, 16 – 2023

  • Fixed: Fatal error “Uncaught TypeError: array_slice” on PHP 8.
  • Added: “Support” and “Rate the plugin” links on the options panel.
  • Tested with WordPress 6.3
  • Tested with WooCommerce 8.1

1.0.7

Release date – April, 05 – 2023

  • Tested with WordPress 6.2

1.0.6

Release date – June, 25 – 2022

  • Tested with WordPress 6.0

1.0.5

Release date – October, 25 – 2021

  • Tested with WordPress 5.8

1.0.4

Release date – May, 14 – 2021

  • Added : Free vs Pro table inside the option panel

1.0.3

Release date – March, 17 – 2021

  • Tested with WordPress 5.7

1.0.2

Release date – December, 01 – 2020

  • Edit – Code optimized

1.0.1

Release date – November, 14 – 2020

  • Added : Option to enable/disable the order details
  • Added : Option to select the position of custom content

1.0.0

  • Initial release
